25: If there are no children in the Kid’s Club 30 minutes prior to closing time the Kid’s club will close.
26: Even though the gym maybe open most major holidays the Kid’s Club will be closed on major holidays.
28: - Kid’s Club is for the use of parents and guardians and their children.
32: - If your child has had a fever or illness in the last 24 hours please do not bring them to the Kid’s Club.
34: - If your child is in the potty training stage, please assist them using the Kid’s Club restroom prior to leaving them in our care.
36: - For the safety of small children and the cleanliness of the Kid’s Club we ask that snacks be limited to items such as dry cereal and dry crackers.
38: - When a child misbehaves, staff will warn the child that the behavior is not acceptable and that the child should stop or he or she will be placed in a time out.
39: Reminder - During time of inclement weather the Kid’s Club will be closed in accordance with Columbia Public Schools in the morning.
40: Check this website for evening update.
